text: Nagaŵaga gampatile maŵanga, nikuti nombe ŵandu ŵaneo pakwete pagapatile maŵanga ganti chisawu gelega, sano galakwego ni masiku gatukugagalausyagalausya chilikati cha ŵandu (lelo kwajendela ichindu chenene ŵane malaŵi nikwisa kwajendela chenene ŵane), soni Allah (atesile yalakweyi) kuti ŵaamanyukule ŵandu ŵakulupilile (kusyesyene, pangatila pa ngondojo), nikuti soni ŵatende ŵane mwa jemanja kuŵa ŵakuwila pa ngondo ja dini, sano Allah jwangaanonyela ŵakulitenda lupuso
